skillTree.localised_description: Pugnacious and stubborn, the war beasts that pull these ramshackle chariots are grotesque combinations of great boar and mighty ram.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Those strong enough to tame the powerful, unruly Razorgors can harness them for chariots.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: "The blood is the prize. The blood is the prize! THE BLOOD IS THE PRIZE!"
Hurling themselves into battle, a whirlwind of appendages and weapons strike, unexpected and deadly.
Possessed by a singular, apocalyptic vision and utter hatred, this champion proliferates the Dark Gods' will.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Will of the Dark Gods"

skillTree.localised_description: He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.
Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
The weird, evil moon hangs low in the sky, drawing reverence from its abominable worshippers.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: The Wargor emanates a subtle, will-sapping aura
A good beating makes the scouts more compliant.
To peer into pure eldritch energy is to gaze at the Ruinous Powers themselves.
Nurgle favors this one.
To see a foeâ€™s plan is a powerful gift.
The sweet, metallic scent of blood hastens the herd.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Often operating their own battlefield manoeuvres, the unyielding Wargors maraud ahead of the warherd with their Bestigor retinues.

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment (when not using a mount)

skillTree.localised_description: Certain lesser beasts thrive under a pack leader, if only just to charge them in the right direction to unleash their savagery.

skillTree.localised_description: Spurred forth by the bellowing Wargors, Beastmen chariots scatter all before them with hooves, horns and blades.

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment (when using a Chariot mount)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Day and night the Wargors brood and plot the myriad ways they can gain the upper hand over their victims.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 5%
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 2

skillTree.localised_description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.
My lord, I believe Iâ€™ve found something of interest...

	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We all must fight, no matter our station.
Iâ€™ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

	(own armies in region)

	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: What was yours is mine now.
We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one has something of the compost heap about themâ€¦
Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Uncommonly intelligent, wargors are still driven by the same lust for carnage as their bestial brethren.
